page.title: 11Village Clubs
page.content: There is a camping club which used to be called Purleigh Herd because they used to keep pigs.It is now owned by the association of camping.It is now called Purleigh Law.The longest you can camp there is twenty one days. We visited Purleigh Church we found that they have a fund for the church. In the local village hall, brownies, guides, cubs and scouts are held. There are village halls at both Purleigh and Cock Clarks where various functions are held. Recently there was a ceilidh and a street party organised at Purleigh. The Women's Institute is also very active.
